sentences.en: A leap year has 366 days.
sentences.cn: 闰年有366天.

sentences.en: As I look back , scenes of the past leap before my eyes.
sentences.cn: 追忆往事, 历历在目.

sentences.en: growing by leaps and bounds.
sentences.cn: 长得飞快

sentences.en: He leapt 27 places to second spot.
sentences.cn: 他上升了27位，跃居第二名。

sentences.en: He threw a stick into the river and the dog went after it in a flying leap.
sentences.cn: 他把一根枝条扔到河里，那条狗一个飞跃就追了过去。

sentences.en: He took a leap over an obstacle.
sentences.cn: 他跃过障碍物.

sentences.en: Her marriage to John was a leap in the dark.
sentences.cn: 她与约翰结婚是贸然行动.

sentences.en: If one sheep leap over the dyke, all the rest will follow.
sentences.cn: 一只羊跳过沟, 其余的羊也跟着跳.

sentences.en: In the last few years, this art has made a big leap.
sentences.cn: 近几年来, 这一艺术有了新的跃进.

sentences.en: It is a big leap in the process of cognition.
sentences.cn: 这是认识过程的一次大飞跃.

sentences.en: My heart leaped when I saw Paul at the airport.
sentences.cn: 在机场看到保罗时，我的心猛地一跳。

sentences.en: Please don't do leap in.
sentences.cn: 请不要急着做这事.

sentences.en: productivity improved in leaps and bounds.
sentences.cn: 生产率突飞猛进地提高。

sentences.en: Prudent people are not going to take a leap in the dark.
sentences.cn: 小心谨慎的人是不会轻易冒险的。

sentences.en: She leapt over the fence.
sentences.cn: 她跳过篱笆。

sentences.en: The result has been a giant leap in productivity.
sentences.cn: 其结果是生产力的大幅提高。

sentences.en: The share price is likely to leap upwards.
sentences.cn: 该股票价格可能会猛涨。

sentences.en: The vaccine represents a quantum leap in healthcare.
sentences.cn: 这种疫苗的问世是医疗保健领域的重大突破。

sentences.en: to take a flying leap into the air
sentences.cn: 腾空向前一跳

sentences.en: Warwicks leap to third in the table, 31 points behind leaders Essex.
sentences.cn: 沃里克队在排名中蹿升至第3名，落后领先的埃塞克斯队31分。

sentences.en: You made me leap out of my skin.
sentences.cn: 你使我大吃一惊.

phrases.tran_cn: 冒险行动，未知数很大之举
大跃进（中国于1958～1960年执行的经济计划）
向…扑去；欣然接受（机会或建议等）
信仰不可捉摸：信仰或相信不可捉摸或无法证明之事物的行为或例子

trans.tran_en: if your heart leaps, you feel a sudden surprise, happiness, or excitement
if your heart leaps, you feel a sudden surprise, happiness, or excitement
if your heart leaps, you feel a sudden surprise, happiness, or excitement
if your heart leaps, you feel a sudden surprise, happiness, or excitement
